title: Friend list problem
body:
When you show offline friends, when you try to add a friend, their name appears at the bottom faded, showing they have not yet accepted, or they are pending.
But when I try it, the name appears for one second, then dissapears...why

replies.body: Does your friend happen to have a summoner name with a special character in it that may not be supported on the NA region? Alternatively, does this happen if your friend tries to add you instead?
There is no special character, as I added him before using the same way. I don't know on his end, because I cant add him, I can't contact him.

We've been seeing some occasional issues with this, so I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) They have the skills and tools necessary to resolve this issue for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.
How would I make/do the support ticket?

If you click on the link below, it will direct you to the ticket submission form.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
